version_description:
- Improved loading speed of "Song of the day" and "Analytics"
- Minor bug fixes

- Improved loading speed of "Song of the day" and "Analytics"
- Minor bug fixes
- Fixed an issue that some graphs are not displayed correctly on Song Of The Day.
- Fixed an issue that some graphs are not displayed correctly on Song Of The Day.
Fixed a crash bug in the player screen in case of specific file formats.
Fixed a crash bug in the player screen in case of specific file formats.

- Fixed a crash bug which occurs on FEATURES screen
- Several optimizations for thumbnail images

- Fixed a crash bug which occurs on FEATURES screen
- Several optimizations for thumbnail images

- Improved the behavior when the headphone is plugged out from the device
- Minor bug fixes

- Improved the behavior when the headphone is plugged out from the device
- Minor bug fixes
Fix an issue that the app can't play track which belongs to Apple Music playlist.
Fix an issue that the app can't play track which belongs to Apple Music playlist.
Fixed minor bugs
Fixed minor bugs
Fixed the issue that iTunes Store search always returns no result.
Fixed the issue that iTunes Store search always returns no result.
Fixed an issue that the playback sound becomes no-sound when the device screen turns to off while playing local tracks on STEREO/MONO modes with the device speaker or wired headphones.
Fixed an issue that the playback sound becomes no-sound when the device screen turns to off while playing local tracks on STEREO/MONO modes with the device speaker or wired headphones.

- Supported Dark Mode on iOS 13
- Fixed an issue that the play buttons not working on Songs Of The Day screen

- Supported Dark Mode on iOS 13
- Fixed an issue that the play buttons not working on Songs Of The Day screen
